SELECT '合计' as equip, count(COMPLETESTATE='Y' OR null) as complete, count(COMPLETESTATE='Y' and ALTPID='0' OR null) as normal, count(COMPLETESTATE='Y' and ALTPID='1' OR null) as danger, count(COMPLETESTATE='Y' and ALTPID='2' OR null) as alarm, count(COMPLETESTATE='W' OR null) as incomplete FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ( to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -1 -- 昨天数据
DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') -1 -- 上月数据
week(TASKSTART_TM)=week(NOW())-1 -- 上周数据
DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') -- 当月数据 )
